alert.note: Alert for Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Toombs County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1043 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near English Eddy, or 4 miles north of Plant Hatch, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... English Eddy, Toombs Central, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner, New Branch and Grays Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
